text:
Not a JDK bug. Running on RH9 Sun J2SDK 1.4.2_03, and verified that isDirectory
() actually returns false for linked file (no matter if referred through link 
or directly).
creator: vilsu74@hotmail.com
vilsu74@hotmail.com
text:
Also, Size for linked entry is empty, and Last Modified entry reads "null". 
Looks like the File-object used to query information refers to something 
entirely different than the requested object?

I don't know, but one thing is certain: we are not going to provide support for
linking besides allowLinking.
creator: remm@apache.org
